        'The Slider component displays a range of values on a horizontal bar, allowing users to choose either a single or a double value.',
    description:
        'The Slider component represents a more feature rich, non-native alternative to the Range component. It is a common user interface element and is useful for fine-tuning various settings, such as volume control, brightness adjustment, or specifying quantities.',
}

<CodeComponent filename="slider.tsx" code="aW1wb3J0IHsgdXNlU2xpZGVyLCBTbGlkZXJIYW5kbGUsIFNsaWRlciB9IGZyb20gIkBmb2xkLWRldi9jb3JlIjsK" />
```tsx
import { useSlider, SliderHandle, Slider } from "@fold-dev/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6]);
    return (<Slider onChange={setValue} values={value} min={0} max={1} step={0.05} anchor={0}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6])

    return (
        <Slider
            onChange={setValue}
            values={value}
            min={0}
            max={1}
            step={0.05}
            anchor={0}
        />
    )
}
```
### Disabled

export const Disabled = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6]);
    return (<Slider onChange={setValue} values={value} min={0} max={1} step={0.05} anchor={0} disabled/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Disabled />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Disabled.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Disabled = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6])

    return (
        <Slider
            onChange={setValue}
            values={value}
            min={0}
            max={1}
            step={0.05}
            anchor={0}
            disabled
        />
    )
}
```
### Markers

export const Markers = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6]);
    return (<Slider markers={20} onChange={setValue} values={value} min={0} max={1} step={0.05} anchor={0}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Markers />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Markers.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Markers = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6])

    return (
        <Slider
            markers={20}
            onChange={setValue}
            values={value}
            min={0}
            max={1}
            step={0.05}
            anchor={0}
        />
    )
}
```
### Double Handles

export const DoubleHandles = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.8]);
    return (<Slider markers={20} onChange={setValue} values={value} min={0} max={1} step={0.05} anchor={0}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<DoubleHandles />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="DoubleHandles.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const DoubleHandles = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.8])

    return (
        <Slider
            markers={20}
            onChange={setValue}
            values={value}
            min={0}
            max={1}
            step={0.05}
            anchor={0}
        />
    )
}
```
### Tooltips

export const Tooltips = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.9]);
    return (<Slider showTooltip markers={10} onChange={setValue} values={value} min={0.5} max={1.5} step={0.05} anchor={0} tooltipValue={(value) => Math.round(value * 100) + ' %'}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Tooltips />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Tooltips.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Tooltips = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.9])

    return (
        <Slider
            showTooltip
            markers={10}
            onChange={setValue}
            values={value}
            min={0.5}
            max={1.5}
            step={0.05}
            anchor={0}
            tooltipValue={(value) => Math.round(value * 100) + ' %'}
        />
    )
}
```
### Tooltips Always On

export const TooltipsAlwaysOn = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.9]);
    return (<Slider markers={10} showTooltipAlways onChange={setValue} values={value} min={0.5} max={1.5} step={0.05} anchor={0} tooltipValue={(value) => Math.round(value * 100) + ' %'}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<TooltipsAlwaysOn />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="TooltipsAlwaysOn.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const TooltipsAlwaysOn = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.9])

    return (
        <Slider
            markers={10}
            showTooltipAlways
            onChange={setValue}
            values={value}
            min={0.5}
            max={1.5}
            step={0.05}
            anchor={0}
            tooltipValue={(value) => Math.round(value * 100) + ' %'}
        />
    )
}
```
### With Icon

export const WithIcon = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.9]);
    return (<Slider thumbIcons={['sun', 'moon']} markers={20} onChange={setValue} values={value} min={0.5} max={1.5} step={0.05} anchor={0} style={{ '--f-slider-handle-size': 'var(--f-size-7)' }}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<WithIcon />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="WithIcon.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const WithIcon = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.9])

    return (
        <Slider
            thumbIcons={['sun', 'moon']}
            markers={20}
            onChange={setValue}
            values={value}
            min={0.5}
            max={1.5}
            step={0.05}
            anchor={0}
            style={{ '--f-slider-handle-size': 'var(--f-size-7)' }}
        />
    )
}
```
### With Color And Labels

export const WithColorAndLabels = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.9]);
    return (<>
            <Text>
                {Math.round(value[0] * 100) / 100} & {Math.round(value[1] * 100) / 100} with color and labels
            </Text>
            <Slider showTooltip markers={11} onChange={setValue} values={value} min={0} max={1} anchor={0} labels tooltipValue={(value) => Math.round(value * 100) + ' %'} labelValue={(value) => Math.round(value * 10) + ' %'} style={{
            '--f-slider-handle-background-color': 'var(--f-color-electric-400)',
            '--f-slider-fill-background': 'var(--f-color-electric-300)',
            '--f-slider-handle-background-color-hover': 'var(--f-color-electric-600)',
        }}/>
        </>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<WithColorAndLabels />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="WithColorAndLabels.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const WithColorAndLabels = () => {
    const { value, setValue } = useSlider([0.6, 0.9])

    return (
        <>
            <Text>
                {Math.round(value[0] * 100) / 100} & {Math.round(value[1] * 100) / 100} with color and labels
            </Text>
            <Slider
                showTooltip
                markers={11}
                onChange={setValue}
                values={value}
                min={0}
                max={1}
                anchor={0}
                labels
                tooltipValue={(value) => Math.round(value * 100) + ' %'}
                labelValue={(value) => Math.round(value * 10) + ' %'}
                style={{
                    '--f-slider-handle-background-color': 'var(--f-color-electric-400)',
                    '--f-slider-fill-background': 'var(--f-color-electric-300)',
                    '--f-slider-handle-background-color-hover': 'var(--f-color-electric-600)',
                }}
            />
        </>
    )
}
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
